item.description:
Hey Everyone,

Bad Boy Bill and crew are coming to the Estate, 10/3. I'm sure many of you have seen him before, but he always puts on a solid, high energy show! I am trying to find out asap, how many of you would be interested in going to see him....I used to hang out with him after a few of his shows in Denver, where he has a partial residency. I will see about getting in touch with him and his crew before the show, to try and get some extra, vip treatment for the group, a possible discount on advanced tickets, or maybe even a pre-show meet up.
item.name: BAD BOY BILL/ALEX PEACE/STEVE SMOOTH
